heroTitle:

with React & TypeScript.
heroSubtitle: Based in Warsaw. Focused on UI/UX, component architecture, and production-ready tooling (Git, Vite, deployment).
whoIAmText: I’m an IT student focused on frontend development. I enjoy turning requirements into clean interfaces and shipping projects end-to-end.
goal2: Teams that care about code quality and UX
goal3: Real products, real users, real feedback
